description.en: In this exciting challenge your task is to kick the ball standing at the start line into any of the three lying cups.

Position the three cups at the exact place you can see in the picture leaving gaps between them.
You have got 3 trials.

You scored once out of the three trials. = Good job! Let's try again.
You scored twice out of the three trials. = Wow! Excellent job! Another try?
You scored three times out of the three trials. = You are such a pro!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programming your robot?

Let's count your points.
You scored once out of the three trials. = 5 points
You scored twice out of the three trials. = 10 points
You scored three times out of the three trials. = 15 points
We would love to see your scores.
